item.title: T-SQL Copy & Paste Pattern - Increasing a performance problem
item.description: Disclaimer: The title is my assumption because I saw it in the past happening this way. This blog post aims to make you remember something: something that is obvious to you, might not be obvious to others. Scenario: A client has a process which consists of a stored procedure that wraps a bunch of other stored procedures. The process runs for about 10 hours. Taking a look…what is running right now?
